Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 108th overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/2/2015, off Earnest Spillman (SF)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2015, hitting .464 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 5/20/2015 with a Fractured Foot, out for 2-3 weeks...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2015, hitting .359 with 4 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2016...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/6/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Traded from San Francisco to Montreal on 2/12/2018 (Going to SF: P Martin Sherrard. Going to MON: CF Ezra Delao, P Bill Freeman, 2B Jose Herrera)...
Injured on 5/3/2018 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2018, hitting .391 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/8/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2019...
Injured on 4/26/2020 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 6/1/2020.
8/24/2020: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $2,650,000 per year, for 2 years.
Traded from Houston to Philadelphia on 2/6/2021 (Going to PHI: CF Ezra Delao. Going to HOU: P Leo Cortez, CF Ru-zuberuto Takamuku)...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Drove in 7 runs against Colorado on 8/20/2021...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2021...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2022...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 3/2/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
